perturbation.original_text:
(a) In full consideration of the provision of the services of the Blockchain Administrator set forth herein, the Fund shall pay the
Blockchain Administrator a fees calculated at the annual rate of 0.20% of the value of the Fund’s average annual net assets. Such fee shall be
accrued daily and paid monthly in arrears.
perturbation.changed_text:
(a) In full consideration of the provision of the services of the Blockchain Administrator set forth herein, the Fund shall pay the
Blockchain Administrator a fee calculated at the annual rate of 0.20% of the value of the Fund’s average annual net assets. Such fee shall be
accrued daily and paid quarterly in arrears.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by stating that the fees are paid 'quarterly in arrears' when the original text states 'monthly in arrears'. This creates confusion about the payment schedule.

perturbation.original_text:
This Agreement may be terminated at any time, without
the payment of any penalty, upon 60 days' written notice, by the vote of a majority of the outstanding voting securities of the Fund or by the vote
of the Fund's Trustees or by the Blockchain Administrator.
perturbation.changed_text:
This Agreement may be terminated at any time, subject to
the payment of a termination fee equal to one year of anticipated fees, upon 60 days' written notice, by the vote of a majority of the outstanding voting securities of the Fund or by the vote
of the Fund's Trustees or by the Blockchain Administrator.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by adding a termination fee to the clause that previously stated termination could occur 'without the payment of any penalty'. This creates ambiguity about the conditions for termination.

perturbation.original_text:
This Agreement shall continue in effect for two years from the date hereof, and thereafter shall continue automatically for
successive annual periods, provided that such continuance is specifically approved at least annually by (A) the vote of the Board, or by the vote
of a majority of the outstanding voting securities of the Fund and (B) the vote of a majority of the Fund's directors who are not parties to this
Agreement or "interested persons" (as such term is defined in Section 2(a)(19) of the Investment Fund Act) of any such party, in accordance with
the requirements of the Investment Fund Act.
perturbation.changed_text:
This Agreement shall continue in effect for one year from the date hereof, and thereafter shall continue automatically for
successive annual periods, provided that such continuance is specifically approved every two years by (A) a simple notification to the Board, or by the vote
of a majority of the outstanding voting securities of the Fund and (B) the vote of a majority of the Fund's directors who are not parties to this
Agreement or "interested persons" (as such term is defined in Section 2(a)(19) of the Investment Fund Act) of any such party, in accordance with
the requirements of the Investment Fund Act.
perturbation.explanation: The modified text changes the initial term from two years to one year and changes the approval of the continuance from annually to every two years and changes the approval type of the board, thus creating a contradiction that makes the contract unenforceable.
